address1: #43/43A 1st Main Road, Mysore Rd, New Timberyard Layout, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560026

partnerDetails.about:
Deltoncontrol & Switchgears LLP (DCSLLP) is a one-of-its-kind, one-stop electrical solutions provider. With an experience andexpertise of over four decades, DCSLLP has emerged from being a normaldistributor to a complete electrical solutions provider.

With an array of products on offer, DCSLLP notjust delivers the finest global technology driven products but also partners with each of its clientsby extending its knowledge & expertisein the field by providing electrical solutions and offering the best after-saleservice in the industry. When you thinkelectrical, think Deltoncontrol.

Vision: To redefine success in the electricaldistribution industry by constantly setting incomparable benchmarks

Mission:Improve our core competencies in the industryby delivering end-to-end, safe, reliable, secured and energy efficient solutions for allelectrical needs backed by excellent360 degree support to all our customers.

EMPOWERING YOU BY POWERING OURSELVES

DCSLLP has pioneered the concept of providingend-to-end solutions in electrical field, and has been able to do sopassionately by ensuring the parallel growth of its infrastructure.

Housing a growing team of 50+ team members,that comprises of 20% of technical experts,we strive to provide real-time solutions to our clients. Constantly upgradingourselves, we have moved to the latest technology platform that assists indelivering all communications withgreater efficiency.
